title: Only at Alton Towers… free Fireworks Spectacular tickets for events booked in 2015
text:
Only at Alton Towers… free Fireworks Spectacular tickets for events booked in 2015 Only at Alton Towers… free Fireworks Spectacular tickets for events booked in 2015 Details Category: Venues & Events Created on Tuesday, 14 July 2015 15:15 Those looking to book events at Alton Towers Resort will receive a supplementary surprise with their booking, as the Resort offers four complimentary tickets to its spectacular fireworks display for all events held for the remainder of 2015 if booked before 8th November. To celebrate the end of the summer season, the Resort will be holding its annual fireworks spectacular in the Theme Park featuring amazing music, incredible lasers and flames that will light up the night sky. As a thank you, all event bookers who confirm an event for 2015 will receive four complimentary tickets to the Theme Park including the fireworks spectacular. 
Rachael Cotton, Head of Trade and Corporate Sales at the Alton Towers Resort said, “We’re delighted to offer event bookers tickets to our fireworks spectacular which is set to return this November. We aim to offer a unique, fun environment for conferences, as well as traditional corporate packages and the additional bonus of tickets to our famous fireworks display certainly promises to dazzle and delight our corporate guests!” The Resort has a number of fantastic delegate rates and packages on offer including the 24 hour delegate package costing from £130 per person (including vat) which includes theme park entry, meeting room hire, three servings of refreshments, a buffet lunch, complimentary Wi-Fi, dinner, stationary, car parking and overnight accommodation in one the Resort’s themed hotels. The fireworks offer applies to all events booked on week days during the remainder of 2015, if booked before 8th November 2015, requiring a minimum of 75 rooms. Subject to availability. Four Theme Park tickets will be offered to the event booker, valid for use between 6th to 8th November 2015 and will include access to the Alton Towers Theme Park until 9pm plus the spectacular Firework Display (6th-8th November) Related articles
